20110114144505.000|20110114144508.000|CC1|MAY BE THE REASON COFFEE SEEMS  
20110114144508.000|20110114144511.000|CC1|TO PROTECT PEOPLE FROM GETTING  
20110114144511.000|20110114144511.000|CC1|TYPE 2 DIABETES.

20110114144531.000|20110114144535.000|CC1|LIKELY TO COME DOWN WITH TYPE 2
